structure.unit: ACQUISITION AND DEVELOPMENT OF PUBLIC PROJECTS THROUGH REVENUE BONDS

text.section: KRS 58.410 to 58.440 does not relate to or affect borrowing by any person or corporation except such as are within the definition of "public body" as set forth in this section.

law.history: Repealed and reenacted 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. V, sec. 291, effective July 13, 1990. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1.
